core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Architectural Precision with Lifestyle Warmth
Content is King: Editorial-style layouts, high-res imagery
Contrast: Deep Charcoal vs Warm Gold vs Crisp White
anti_patterns: No standard shadow-sm (use layered, diffuse shadows)

typography.instructions: Import 'Outfit' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts. Use Outfit for all main headings to give a modern premium feel. Use Manrope for body text for optimal readability.

header.style: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 transition-all duration-300
header.cta_button: rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-semibold text-sm transition-transform hover:scale-105

hero.typography: Left-aligned, imposing, high contrast against dark overlay
hero.stats_card: absolute -bottom-16 right-6 md:right-20 bg-white p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl max-w-sm w-full z-20 hidden md:block

property_card.style: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500
property_card.image: h-[400px] w-full object-cover transition-transform duration-700 group-hover:scale-110
property_card.overlay: absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/60 via-transparent to-transparent opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-500

cards.feature_card: p-8 rounded-2xl bg-[#F8F9FA] border border-transparent hover:border-[#C19A6B]/30 transition-colors

buttons.primary: bg-[#C19A6B] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-semibold hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-[#C19A6B]/20 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#1A1A1A] border border-[#1A1A1A]/10 rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-semibold hover:bg-[#F8F9FA] transition-all
buttons.outline_light: border border-white text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-semibold hover:bg-white hover:text-[#1A1A1A] transition-all

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure Gold (#C19A6B) is used on White/Dark backgrounds with sufficient size. Avoid Gold text on White bg for small fonts.

universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
